price: Sivyo hivyo! Itakapo vunjwa ardhi vipande vipande,
arabic: كَلَّآۖ إِذَا دُكَّتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ دَكّٗا دَكّٗا
footnotes: Wacheni vitendo hivyo! Kwani inakungojeeni siku itapo lazwa ardhi iwe sawa sawa,

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: kallā idhā dukkati al-arḍu dakkan dakkan
